channel.title: Interlink Conference on Laura Kalbag
channel.description: Recent content in Interlink Conference on Laura Kalbag

item.title: Video interview for Interlink conference
item.description: Sadly, Interlink conference has been cancelled. I’m gutted that I won’t be visiting Canada this year, but I totally understand how difficult it is to run a conference, especially if you’re trying to put on the best possible event for your attendees and speakers. Last week I had a chat with my friend Steve Fisher about my upcoming talk and workshop at Interlink conference and all things Canadian. It was a fun way to end the day, and is complete with me doing a really terrible Canadian accent.

item.title: Design theory for the web workshop at Interlink conference
item.description:
Sadly, Interlink conference has been cancelled. I’m gutted that I won’t be visiting Canada this year, but I totally understand how difficult it is to run a conference, especially if you’re trying to put on the best possible event for your attendees and speakers. I’m running my ‘Design theory for the web’ workshop at Interlink conference in Canada on the 18th of June.
It’s a one day workshop and I’ve written a mega description below for anyone wanting to know more:
